content.title: Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra Scholarship Scheme
content.beneficiary: Students of Himachal Pradesh studying at Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra
content.details: The scheme 'Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra Scholarship Scheme' was started by the Department of Education, Himachal Pradesh. Under the scheme, a scholarship is given to the students of Himachal Pradesh who are studying at Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra. The Scholarships will be awarded on merit-cum-means basis to such students who are eligible for admission and who actually join the Sainik Schools on the basis of a competitive entrance examination that may be held every year for this purpose.
benefits: Under the scheme, the scholarship will be given to the eligible students at the rate of ₹18000/- per annum.
In addition, the students will be given Dietary Money @ ₹10/- per day for 295 days.
Clothing Allowance @ ₹1500/- per annum for the first year and ₹750/- per annum for the subsequent years.
eligibility: The students who are studying in Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra and are Bonafide residents of Himachal Pradesh from Class VI to XII will be eligible to apply for the scholarship.

Conditions for the award of Renewal of Scholarships: A scholarship once awarded to a student will continue to be awarded to him throughout this stay in the school, provided the student makes satisfactory progress in his standard, is not reported adversely regarding discipline, does not draw a scholarship for financial assistance of any kind from any other source, and if the student fails in any Class the scholarship will be suspended for that particular class.
Revision of Scholarships: A scholarship once awarded will be tenable for the entire course of education and will not be subject to any revision for subsequent changes in income.
content.application_process: Online. Students applying for the scholarship for the first time need to 'Register' using the icon 'New Registration' at the NSP Portal URL - https://scholarships.gov.in/, by providing accurate and correct information as per their documents. After successful registration, students will get their 'Student Registration ID' and can log in to apply.
documents_required: Copy of Himachali Bonafide Certificate (Domicile of Himachal Pradesh)
Copy of Marks Certificate for Previous Years
Copy of the first page of the Bank Passbook
Copy of Student School Bonafide Certificate signed by Principal
Income Certificate of Parent/Guardian (Issued by an officer not below the rank of Tehsildar)
Email and Mobile Number of Parents

faqs.question: What is the 'Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra Scholarship Scheme'?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, a scholarship is given to the students of Himachal Pradesh who are studying at Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra. The Scholarships will be awarded on merit-cum-means basis to such students who are eligible for admission and who actually join the Sainik Schools on the basis of a competitive entrance examination that may be held every year for this purpose.

faqs.question: Which is the implementing department of this scheme?
Who is eligible to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The students who are studying in Sainik School Sujanpur Tihra and are Bonafide residents of Himachal Pradesh from Class VI to XII will be eligible to apply for the scholarship.

faqs.question: Is this scholarship scheme only for the students of Himachal Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Yes, only those students shall be eligible for the award of scholarships who are Bonafide residents of Himachal Pradesh.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scholarships shall be paid at the rate of ₹18000/- per annum per student.

faqs.question: What other benefits will be given to the students under the scheme?
faqs.answer: In addition, the students will be given Dietary Money @ ₹10/- per day for 295 days. Clothing Allowance @ ₹1500/- per annum for the first year and ₹750/- per annum for the subsequent years.

faqs.question: For how long a student will receive scholarship?
faqs.answer: The student will receive the scholarship for the entire period of his/her course of education.

faqs.question: What are the conditions for the award of Renewal of Scholarships?
faqs.answer: A scholarship once awarded to a student will continue to be awarded to him throughout this stay in the school, provided the student makes satisfactory progress in his standard, is not reported adversely regarding discipline, does not draw a scholarship for financial assistance of any kind from any other source, and if the student fails in any Class the scholarship will be suspended for that particular class.

faqs.question: How to apply for this scholarship?
faqs.answer: Online submission of the application form can be done through the website of the National Scholarship Portal.

faqs.question: How to check the status of my application?
faqs.answer: Student can check the status of Online Application by submitting his/her Permanent id and Date Of Birth and open the link 'Check your Status'.
